# scm_bgp_address_family_profile (Resource)

BgpAddressFamilyProfile resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "scm_bgp_address_family_profile" "scm_bgp_address_family_profile" {
  folder = "ngfw-shared"
  name   = "scm_bgp_address_family_profile"
  ipv4 = {
    unicast = {
      enable = true
      allowas_in = {
        origin = {}
      }
      next_hop = {
        self = {}
      }
    }
  }
}
```

- `snippet` (String) The snippet in which the resource is defined
> ℹ️ **Note:** You must specify exactly one of `device`, `folder`, and `snippet`.

## Import

The following command can be used to import a resource not managed by Terraform:

```bash
terraform import scm_bgp_address_family_profile.example folder:::id
```

or

```bash
terraform import scm_bgp_address_family_profile.example :snippet::id
```

or

```bash
terraform import scm_bgp_address_family_profile.example ::device:id
```

**Note:** Please provide just one of folder, snippet, or device for the import command.
